   19: %%
   20: -module(erl_lint_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: %%-define(debug, true).
   23: 
   24: -ifdef(debug).
   25: -define(line, put(line, ?LINE), ).
   26: -define(config(X,Y), foo).
   27: -define(datadir, "erl_lint_SUITE_data").
   28: -define(privdir, "erl_lint_SUITE_priv").
   29: -define(t, test_server).
   30: -else.
   31: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   32: -define(datadir, proplists:get_value(data_dir, Conf)).
   33: -define(privdir, proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Conf)).
   34: -endif.
   35: 
   36: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0]).
   37: 
   38: -export([singleton_type_var_errors/1,
   39:          documentation_attributes/1,
   40:          unused_vars_warn_basic/1,
   41:          unused_vars_warn_lc/1,
   42:          unused_vars_warn_rec/1,
   43:          unused_vars_warn_fun/1,
   44:          unused_vars_OTP_4858/1,
   45:          unused_unsafe_vars_warn/1,
   46:          export_vars_warn/1,
   47:          shadow_vars/1,
   48:          unused_import/1,
   49:          unused_function/1,
   50:          unsafe_vars/1,unsafe_vars2/1,
   51:          unsafe_vars_try/1,
   52:          unsized_binary_in_bin_gen_pattern/1,
   53:          guard/1, otp_4886/1, otp_4988/1, otp_5091/1, otp_5276/1, otp_5338/1,
   54:          otp_5362/1, otp_5371/1, otp_7227/1, binary_aliases/1,
   55:          otp_5494/1, otp_5644/1, otp_5878/1,
   56:          otp_5917/1, otp_6585/1, otp_6885/1, otp_10436/1, otp_11254/1,
   57:          otp_11772/1, otp_11771/1, otp_11872/1,
   58:          export_all/1,
   59:          bif_clash/1,
   60:          behaviour_basic/1, behaviour_multiple/1, otp_11861/1,
   61:          otp_7550/1,
   62:          otp_8051/1,
   63:          format_warn/1,
   64:          on_load_successful/1, on_load_failing/1,
   65:          too_many_arguments/1,
   66:          basic_errors/1,bin_syntax_errors/1,
   67:          predef/1,
   68:          maps/1,maps_type/1,maps_parallel_match/1,
   69:          otp_11851/1,otp_11879/1,otp_13230/1,
   70:          record_errors/1, otp_11879_cont/1,
   71:          non_latin1_module/1, illegal_module_name/1, otp_14323/1,
   72:          stacktrace_syntax/1,
   73:          otp_14285/1, otp_14378/1,
   74:          external_funs/1,otp_15456/1,otp_15563/1,
   75:          unused_type/1,binary_types/1,removed/1, otp_16516/1,
   76:          inline_nifs/1,
   77:          undefined_nifs/1,
   78:          no_load_nif/1,
   79:          warn_missing_spec/1,
   80:          otp_16824/1,
   81:          underscore_match/1,
   82:          unused_record/1,
   83:          unused_type2/1,
   84:          eep49/1,
   85:          redefined_builtin_type/1,
   86:          tilde_k/1,
   87:          match_float_zero/1,
   88:          undefined_module/1,
   89:          update_literal/1,
   90:          messages_with_jaro_suggestions/1]).
   91: 
   92: suite() ->
   93:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   94:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   95: 
   96: all() -> 
   97:     [{group, unused_vars_warn}, export_vars_warn,
   98:      shadow_vars, unused_import, unused_function,
   99:      unsafe_vars, unsafe_vars2, unsafe_vars_try, guard,
  100:      unsized_binary_in_bin_gen_pattern,
  101:      otp_4886, otp_4988, otp_5091, otp_5276, otp_5338,
  102:      otp_5362, otp_5371, otp_7227, binary_aliases, otp_5494, otp_5644,
  103:      otp_5878, otp_5917, otp_6585, otp_6885, otp_10436, otp_11254,
  104:      otp_11772, otp_11771, otp_11872, export_all,
  105:      bif_clash, behaviour_basic, behaviour_multiple, otp_11861,
  106:      otp_7550, otp_8051, format_warn, {group, on_load},
  107:      too_many_arguments, basic_errors, bin_syntax_errors, predef,
  108:      maps, maps_type, maps_parallel_match,
  109:      otp_11851, otp_11879, otp_13230,
  110:      record_errors, otp_11879_cont,
  111:      non_latin1_module, illegal_module_name, otp_14323,
  112:      stacktrace_syntax, otp_14285, otp_14378, external_funs,
  113:      otp_15456, otp_15563, unused_type, binary_types, removed, otp_16516,
  114:      undefined_nifs,
  115:      no_load_nif,
  116:      inline_nifs, warn_missing_spec, otp_16824,
  117:      underscore_match, unused_record, unused_type2,
  118:      eep49,
  119:      redefined_builtin_type,
  120:      tilde_k,
  121:      singleton_type_var_errors,
  122:      documentation_attributes,
  123:      match_float_zero,
  124:      undefined_module,
  125:      update_literal,
  126:      messages_with_jaro_suggestions].
  127: 
  128: groups() -> 
  129:     [{unused_vars_warn, [],
  130:       [unused_vars_warn_basic, unused_vars_warn_lc,
  131:        unused_vars_warn_rec, unused_vars_warn_fun,
  132:        unused_vars_OTP_4858, unused_unsafe_vars_warn]},
  133:      {on_load, [], [on_load_successful, on_load_failing]}].
  134: 
  135: 
  136: %% Warnings for unused variables in some simple cases.
  137: unused_vars_warn_basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  138:     Ts = [{basic1,
  139:            <<"f(F) -> % F unused.
  140:                 ok.
  141: 
  142: f(F, F) ->
  143:     ok.
  144: 
  145: g(_X) ->
  146:     y.
  147: 
  148: h(P) ->
  149:     P.
  150: 
  151: x(N) ->
  152:     case a:b() of
  153: 	[N|Y] -> % Y unused.
  154: 	    ok
  155:     end.
  156: 
  157: y(N, L) ->
  158:     lists:map(fun(T) -> T*N end, L).
  159: 
  160: z(N, L) -> % N unused
  161:     lists:map(fun(N, T) -> T*N end, L).  % N shadowed.
  162: 
  163: 
  164: c(A) ->
  165:     case A of
  166: 	1 -> B = []; % B unused.
  167: 	2 -> B = []; % B unused.
  168: 	3 -> B = f, B
  169:     end.
  170: ">>,
  171: 	   [warn_unused_vars],
  172: {warnings,[{{1,23},erl_lint,{unused_var,'F'}},
  173: 	   {{15,5},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  174: 	   {{22,3},erl_lint,{unused_var,'N'}},
  175: 	   {{23,19},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'N','fun'}},
  176: 	   {{28,7},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
  177: 	   {{29,7},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}}]}},
  178:           {basic2,
  179:            <<"-record(r, {x,y}).
  180:               f({X,Y}) -> {Z=X,Z=Y};
  181:               f([H|T]) -> [Z=H|Z=T];
  182:               f(#r{x=X,y=Y}) -> #r{x=A=X,y=A=Y}.
  183:               g({M, F}) -> (Z=M):(Z=F)();
  184:               g({M, F, Arg}) -> (Z=M):F(Z=Arg).
  185:               h(X, Y) -> (Z=X) + (Z=Y).">>,
  186:            [warn_unused_vars], []},
  187:           {basic3,
  188:            <<"f(E) ->
  189:                   X = Y = E.">>,
  190:            [warn_unused_vars],
  191:            {warnings,[{{2,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  192:                       {{2,23},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}}]}}],
  193:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
  194:     ok.
  195: 
  196: %% Warnings for unused variables in list comprehensions.
  197: unused_vars_warn_lc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  198:     Ts = [{lc1, 
  199:            <<"bin([X]) ->
  200:                   [A || <<A:X>> <- []]; % X used, not shadowed.
  201:               bin({X}) ->
  202:                   [X || <<X:X>> <- []]; % X used, and shadowed.
  203:               bin({X,Y,Z}) ->
  204:                   [{A,B} || <<A:X>> <- Z, <<B:Y>> <- Z];
  205:               bin([X,Y,Z]) -> % Y unused.
  206:                   [C || <<V:X>> <- Z, <<B:V>> <- Z, <<C:B>> <- Z].
  207:            ">>, 
  208:            [warn_unused_vars],
  209:            {warnings, [{{4,27},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}},
  210:                        {{7,22},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}}]}},
  211: 
  212:           {lc2,
  213:            <<"bin([X]) ->
  214:                   [A || <<A:X>> <- []]; % X used, not shadowed.
  215:               bin({X}) ->
  216:                   [X || <<X:X>> <- []]; % X used, and shadowed.
  217:               bin({X,Y,Z}) ->
  218:                   [{A,B} || <<A:X>> <- Z, <<B:Y>> <- Z];
  219:               bin([X,Y,Z]) -> % Y unused.
  220:                   [C || <<V:X>> <- Z, <<B:V>> <- Z, <<C:B>> <- Z].
  221:            ">>,
  222:            [warn_unused_vars],
  223:            {warnings,[{{4,27},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}},
  224:                       {{7,22},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}}]}},
  225: 
  226:           {lc3,
  227:            <<"a([A]) ->
  228:                   B = foo,
  229:                   [{C,B} || {C,_} <- A];
  230:               a({A}) ->
  231:                   B = foo,
  232:                   [C || {C,_} <- [B,A]];
  233:               a({A,A}) ->
  234:                   B = foo,
  235:                   [C || {C,_} <- B, B < A].
  236:            ">>,
  237:            [warn_unused_vars],
  238:            []},
  239: 
  240:           {lc4,
  241:            <<"b(A) ->
  242:                   B = foo, % B unused.
  243:                   [C || {C,_} <- A].
  244:            ">>,
  245:            [warn_unused_vars],
  246:            {warnings,[{{2,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}}]}},
  247: 
  248:           {lc5,
  249:            <<"c(A) ->
  250:                   B = foo,
  251:                   [C || {C,_} <- A],
  252:                   B.
  253:            ">>,
  254:            [warn_unused_vars],
  255:            []},
  256: 
  257:           {lc6,
  258:            <<"d(A) ->
  259:                   B = foo,
  260:                   [{A,B} || {Id,_} <- A]. % Id unused.
  261:            ">>,
  262:            [warn_unused_vars],
  263:            {warnings,[{{3,30},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Id'}}]}},
  264: 
  265:           {lc7,
  266:            <<"e(A) ->
  267:                   B = foo, % B unused.
  268:                   [B || B <- A]. % B shadowed.
  269:            ">>,
  270:            [warn_unused_vars],
  271:            {warnings,[{{2,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
  272:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'B',generate}}]}},
  273: 
  274:           {lc8,
  275:            <<"f(A) ->
  276:                   B = foo,
  277:                   [B || B <- A], % B shadowed.
  278:                   B.
  279:            ">>,
  280:            [warn_unused_vars],
  281:            {warnings,[{{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'B',generate}}]}},
  282: 
  283:           {lc9,
  284:            <<"g(A) ->
  285:                   B = foo, % B unused.
  286:                   [A || B <- A]. % B shadowed, B unused.
  287:            ">>,
  288:            [warn_unused_vars],
  289:            {warnings,[{{2,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
  290:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
  291:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'B',generate}}]}},
  292: 
  293:           {lc10,
  294:            <<"h(A) ->
  295:                   B = foo,
  296:                   [A || B <- A], % B shadowed, B unused.
  297:                   B.
  298:            ">>,
  299:            [warn_unused_vars],
  300:            {warnings,[{{3,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
  301:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'B',generate}}]}},
  302: 
  303:           {lc11,
  304:            <<"i(X) ->
  305:                   [Z || Z <- X, % Z unused.
  306:                         Z = X <- [foo]]. % X and Z shadowed. X unused!
  307:            ">>,
  308:            [warn_unused_vars],
  309:            {warnings,[{{2,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  310:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}},
  311:                       {{3,29},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  312:                       {{3,29},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}}]}},
  313: 
  314:           {lc12,
  315:            <<"j({X}) ->
  316:                   [Z || Z <- X, % Z unused.
  317:                         Z <- X = [[1,2,3]], % Z shadowed. Z unused.
  318:                         Z <- X, % Z shadowed. Z unused.
  319:                         Z <- X]; % Z shadowed.
  320:               j(X) ->
  321:                   [foo || X <- X, % X shadowed.
  322:                         X <-    % X shadowed. X unused.
  323:                              X =
  324:                                  Y = [[1,2,3]], % Y unused.
  325:                         X <- [], % X shadowed.
  326:                         X <- X]. % X shadowed. X unused.
  327:            ">>,
  328:            [warn_unused_vars],
  329:            {warnings,[{{2,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  330:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  331:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}},
  332:                       {{4,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  333:                       {{4,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}},
  334:                       {{5,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}},
  335:                       {{7,27},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}},
  336:                       {{8,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  337:                       {{8,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}},
  338:                       {{10,34},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  339:                       {{11,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}},
  340:                       {{12,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  341:                       {{12,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}}]}},
  342: 
  343:           {lc13,
  344:            <<"k(X) ->
  345:                   [Z || Z <- Y = X]; % Y unused.
  346:               k(X) ->
  347:                   [Z || Z <- X = Y = X]; % Y unused!
  348:               k(X) ->
  349:                   [Z || Z <- begin X = Y = X, Y end];
  350:               k(X) ->
  351:                   [{Y,W} || W <- Y = X]; % Y unbound
  352:               k(X) ->
  353:                   [Z || Z <- (Y = X), % Y unused.
  354:                        Y > X]; % Y unbound.
  355:               k(X) ->
  356:                   [Y || Y = X > 3, Z = X]; % Z unused.
  357:               k(X) ->
  358:                   [Z || Y = X > 3, Z = X]. % Y unused.
  359:            ">>,
  360:            [warn_unused_vars],
  361:            {error,[{{8,21},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'Y'}},
  362:                    {{11,24},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'Y'}}],
  363:                   [{{2,30},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  364:                    {{4,34},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  365:                    {{8,34},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  366:                    {{10,31},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  367:                    {{13,36},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  368:                    {{15,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}}]}},
  369: 
  370:           {lc14,
  371:            <<"lc2() ->
  372:                   Z = [[1],[2],[3]], 
  373:                   [X || Z <- Z, % Z shadowed.
  374:                         X <- Z].
  375:            ">>,
  376:            [warn_unused_vars],
  377:            {warnings,[{{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}}]}},
  378: 
  379:           {lc15,
  380:            <<"lc3() ->
  381:                   Z = [1,2,3], 
  382:                   [X || X <- Z, 
  383:                         Z <- Z]. % Z shadowed. Z unused.
  384:            ">>,
  385:            [warn_unused_vars],
  386:            {warnings,[{{4,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  387:                       {{4,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}}]}},
  388: 
  389:           {lc16,
  390:            <<"bin(Z) ->
  391:                   case bar of
  392:                       true ->
  393:                           U = 2;
  394:                       false ->
  395:                           true
  396:                   end,
  397:                   case bar of
  398:                       true ->
  399:                           X = 2;
  400:                       false ->
  401:                           X = 3
  402:                   end,
  403:                   case foo of
  404:                       true ->
  405:                           Y = 3; % Y unused.
  406:                       false ->
  407:                           4
  408:                   end,
  409:                   case foo of
  410:                       1 ->
  411:                           U; % U unsafe.
  412:                       2 ->
  413:                           [Z || <<U:X>> <- Z]; % (X exported.) U unused.
  414:                       3 ->
  415:                           [Z || <<U:X>> <- Z], % (X exported.) U unused.
  416:                           U % U unsafe.
  417:                   end.
  418:            ">>,
  419:            [warn_unused_vars],
  420:            {error,[{{22,27},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'U',{'case',{2,19}}}},
  421:                    {{27,27},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'U',{'case',{2,19}}}}],
  422:             [{{16,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  423:              {{24,35},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}},
  424:              {{26,35},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}}]}},
  425: 
  426:           {lc17,
  427:            <<"bin(Z) ->
  428:                   %% This used to pass erl_lint...
  429:                   case bar of
  430:                       true ->
  431:                           U = 2;
  432:                       false ->
  433:                           true
  434:                   end,
  435:                   case bar of
  436:                       true ->
  437:                           X = 2;
  438:                       false ->
  439:                           X = 3
  440:                   end,
  441:                   case foo of
  442:                       true ->
  443:                           Y = 3; % Y unused.
  444:                       false ->
  445:                           4
  446:                   end,
  447:                   [Z || <<U:X>> <- Z], % (X exported.) U unused.
  448:                   U. % U unsafe.
  449:            ">>,
  450:            [warn_unused_vars],
  451:            {error,[{{22,19},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'U',{'case',{3,19}}}}],
  452:             [{{17,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  453:              {{21,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}}]}},
  454: 
  455:           {lc18,
  456:            <<"bin(Z) ->
  457:                   case bar of
  458:                       true ->
  459:                           U = 2;
  460:                       false ->
  461:                           true
  462:                   end,
  463:                   case bar of
  464:                       true ->
  465:                           X = 2;
  466:                       false ->
  467:                           X = 3
  468:                   end,
  469:                   case foo of
  470:                       true ->
  471:                           Y = 3;
  472:                       false ->
  473:                           4
  474:                   end,
  475:                   [B || <<U: % U unused
  476:                           U>> <- X, <<B:Y>> <- Z]. % U unsafe. Y unsafe. 
  477: 						% U shadowed. (X exported.)
  478:            ">>,
  479:            [warn_unused_vars],
  480:            {error,[{{21,27},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'U',{'case',{2,19}}}},
  481:                    {{21,41},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'Y',{'case',{14,19}}}}],
  482:             [{{20,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}}
  483:             ]}},
  484: 
  485:           {lc19,
  486:            <<"p({B,C}) ->
  487:                   <<A:B,A:C>> = <<17:32>>;
  488:               p(B) ->
  489:                   <<A:B>> = <<17:32>>. % A unused.
  490:            ">>,
  491:            [warn_unused_vars],
  492:            {warnings,[{{4,21},erl_lint,{unused_var,'A'}}]}},
  493: 
  494:           {lc20,
  495:            <<"c({I1,I2}) ->
  496:                   if
  497:                       <<I1:I2>> == <<>> ->
  498:                           foo
  499:                   end;
  500:               c([C1,C2]) -> % C1 unused.
  501:                   case foo of
  502:                       <<C2:C2,
  503:                         C3:C2>> -> % C3 unused.
  504:                           bar
  505:                   end.
  506: 
  507:            ">>,
  508:            [warn_unused_vars],
  509:            {warnings,[{{6,18},erl_lint,{unused_var,'C1'}},
  510:                       {{7,19},sys_core_fold,{nomatch,no_clause}},
  511:                       {{9,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'C3'}}]}},
  512: 
  513:           {lc21,
  514:            <<"t() ->
  515:                   S = 8,
  516:                   case <<3:8>> of
  517:                       <<X:S>> ->
  518:                           X;
  519:                       <<S:X>> -> % X unbound
  520:                           foo
  521:                   end;
  522:               t() ->
  523:                   S = 8,
  524:                   case <<3:8>> of
  525:                       <<S:S>> ->
  526:                           S;
  527:                       <<Q:32>> -> % Q unused.
  528:                           foo
  529:                   end.
  530:            ">>,
  531:            [warn_unused_vars],
  532:            {error,[{{6,27},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'X'}}],
  533:                   [{{14,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Q'}}]}}
  534: 
  535:           ],
  536:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
  537:     ok.
  538: 
  539: 
  540: %% Warnings for unused variables in records.
  541: unused_vars_warn_rec(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  542:     Ts = [{rec1, % An example provided by Bjorn.
  543:            <<"-record(edge,
  544:                       {ltpr,
  545:                        ltsu,
  546:                        rtpr,
  547:                        rtsu
  548:                       }).
  549: 
  550:               f1(#edge{ltpr = A, ltsu = A}) ->
  551:                   true;
  552:               f1({Q, Q}) ->
  553:                   true.
  554: 
  555:               f2(Edge, Etab) ->
  556:                   case gb_trees:lookup(Edge, Etab) of
  557:                       {value,#edge{ltpr=Same,ltsu=Same}} -> ok;
  558:                       {value,_} -> error
  559:                   end.
  560: 
  561:               bar(Edge, Etab) ->
  562:                   case gb_trees:lookup(Edge, Etab) of
  563:                       {Same,Same} -> ok;
  564:                       {value,#edge{ltpr=Same}} -> ok; % Same unused.
  565:                       {value,_} -> error
  566:                   end.
  567:            ">>,
  568:            [warn_unused_vars],
  569:            {warnings,[{{22,41},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Same'}}]}},
  570:           {rec2,
  571:            <<"-record(r, {a,b}).
  572:               f(X, Y) -> #r{a=[K || K <- Y], b=[K || K <- Y]}.
  573:               g(X, Y) -> #r{a=lists:map(fun (K) -> K end, Y),
  574:                             b=lists:map(fun (K) -> K end, Y)}.
  575:               h(X, Y) -> #r{a=case Y of _ when is_list(Y) -> Y end,
  576:                             b=case Y of _ when is_list(Y) -> Y end}.
  577:               i(X, Y) -> #r{a=if is_list(Y) -> Y end, b=if is_list(Y) -> Y end}.
  578:              ">>,
  579:            [warn_unused_vars],
  580:            {warnings,[{{2,17},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  581:                       {{3,17},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  582:                       {{5,17},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  583:                       {{7,17},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}}]}},
  584:           {rec3,
  585:            <<"-record(r, {a}).
  586:               t() -> X = 1, #r{a=foo, a=bar, a=qux}.
  587:              ">>,
  588:            [warn_unused_vars],
  589:            {error,[{{2,39},erl_lint,{redefine_field,r,a}},
  590:                    {{2,46},erl_lint,{redefine_field,r,a}}],
  591:                   [{{2,22},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}}]}}],
  592:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
  593:     ok.
  594: 
  595: %% Warnings for unused variables in funs.
  596: unused_vars_warn_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  597:     Ts = [{fun1,
  598:            <<"a({A,B}) -> % A unused.
  599:                   fun(A) -> B end; % A shadowed. A unused.
  600:               a([A,B]) ->
  601:                   fun(<<A:B>>, % A shadowed. A unused.
  602:                        <<Q:A>>) -> foo % Q unused.
  603:                   end;
  604:               a({A,B,C,D,E}) ->
  605:                   fun(E) when C == <<A:A>>, <<17:B>> == D -> % E shadowed. E unused.
  606:                           foo
  607:                   end,
  608:                   E;
  609:               a([A,B,C,D,E]) -> % E unused.
  610:                   fun() ->
  611:                           (C == <<A:A>>) and (<<17:B>> == D)
  612:                   end.
  613:            ">>,
  614:            [warn_unused_vars],
  615:            {warnings,[{{1,24},erl_lint,{unused_var,'A'}},
  616:                       {{2,23},erl_lint,{unused_var,'A'}},
  617:                       {{2,23},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'A','fun'}},
  618:                       {{4,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'A'}},
  619:                       {{4,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'A','fun'}},
  620:                       {{5,26},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Q'}},
  621:                       {{8,19},sys_core_fold,{ignored,useless_building}},
  622:                       {{8,23},erl_lint,{unused_var,'E'}},
  623:                       {{8,23},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'E','fun'}},
  624:                       {{12,26},erl_lint,{unused_var,'E'}}]}},
  625: 
  626:           {fun2,
  627:            <<"u() ->
  628:                   case foo of
  629:                       true ->
  630:                           U = 2;
  631:                       false ->
  632:                           true
  633:                   end,
  634:                   fun(U) -> foo end, % U unused.
  635:                   U; % U unsafe.
  636:               u() ->
  637:                   case foo of

  639:                           U = 2;
  640:                       false ->
  641:                           U = 3

  646:                   case foo of
  647:                       true ->
  648:                           U = 2; % U unused.
  649:                       false ->
  650:                           U = 3 % U unused.
  651:                   end,
  652:                   fun(U) -> foo end. % U shadowed. U unused.
  653:            ">>,
  654:            [warn_unused_vars],
  655:            {error,[{{9,19},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'U',{'case',{2,19}}}}],
  656:               [{{8,23},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}},
  657:                {{17,23},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}},
  658:                {{17,23},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'U','fun'}},
  659:                {{22,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}},
  660:                {{24,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}},
  661:                {{26,23},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}},
  662:                {{26,23},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'U','fun'}}]}},
  663:           {named_fun,
  664:            <<"u() ->
  665:                   fun U() -> foo end, % U unused.
  666:                   U; % U unbound.
  667:               u() ->
  668:                   case foo of
  669:                       true ->
  670:                           U = 2;
  671:                       false ->
  672:                           true
  673:                   end,
  674:                   fun U() -> foo end, % U unused.
  675:                   U; % U unsafe.
  676:               u() ->
  677:                   case foo of
  678:                       true ->
  679:                           U = 2;
  680:                       false ->
  681:                           U = 3
  682:                   end,
  683:                   fun U() -> foo end, % U shadowed. U unused.
  684:                   U;
  685:               u() ->
  686:                   case foo of
  687:                       true ->
  688:                           U = 2; % U unused.
  689:                       false ->
  690:                           U = 3 % U unused.
  691:                   end,
  692:                   fun U() -> foo end; % U shadowed. U unused.
  693:               u() ->
  694:                   fun U(U) -> foo end; % U shadowed. U unused.
  695:               u() ->
  696:                   fun U(1) -> U; U(U) -> foo end; % U shadowed. U unused.
  697:               u() ->
  698:                   fun _(N) -> N + 1 end.  % Cover handling of '_' name.
  699:            ">>,
  700:            [warn_unused_vars],
  701:            {error,[{{3,19},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'U'}},
  702:                    {{12,19},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'U',{'case',{5,19}}}}],
  703:                   [{{2,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}},
  704:                    {{11,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}},
  705:                    {{20,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}},
  706:                    {{20,19},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'U','named fun'}},

  708:                    {{27,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}},
  709:                    {{29,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}},

  714:                    {{33,36},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}},
  715:                    {{33,36},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'U','fun'}}]}}
  716:           ],
  717:     [] = run(Config, Ts),

  720: %% Bit syntax, binsize variable used in the same matching.
  721: unused_vars_OTP_4858(Config) when is_list(Config) ->

  724:                   B.

  731:            ">>,

  784: %% Warnings for exported variables.
  785: export_vars_warn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  786:     Ts = [{exp1,
  787:            <<"u() ->
  788:                   case foo of
  789:                       1 ->
  790:                           A = 1,
  791:                           B = 2,
  792:                           W = 3, % W unused.
  793:                           Z = 3; % Z unused.
  794:                       2 ->
  795:                           B = 2,
  796:                           Z = 4 % Z unused.
  797:                   end,
  798:                   case bar of
  799:                       true ->
  800:                           A = 17, % A unsafe.
  801:                           X = 3, % X unused.
  802:                           U = 2,
  803:                           U;
  804:                       false ->
  805:                           B = 19, % B exported.
  806:                           U = 3; % U unused.
  807:                       foo ->
  808:                           X = 3,
  809:                           X;
  810:                       bar ->
  811:                           X = 9, % X unused.
  812:                           U = 14 % U unused.
  813:                   end.
  814:            ">>,
  815:            [warn_unused_vars],
  816:            {error,[{{14,27},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'A',{'case',{2,19}}}}],
  817:                   [{{6,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'W'}},
  818:                    {{7,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  819:                    {{10,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  820:                    {{15,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  821:                    {{19,27},erl_lint,{exported_var,'B',{'case',{2,19}}}},
  822:                    {{20,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}},
  823:                    {{25,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  824:                    {{26,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}}]}},
  825: 
  826:           {exp2,
  827:            <<"bin(A) ->
  828:                   receive
  829:                       M ->
  830:                            X = M,
  831:                            Y = M,
  832:                            Z = M
  833:                   end,
  834:                   [B || <<B:X>> <- A], % X exported.
  835:                   Y = B, % Y exported. B unbound.
  836:                   [B || B <- Z]. % Z exported. B shadowed.
  837:            ">>,
  838:            [warn_export_vars],
  839:            {error,[{{9,23},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'B'}}],
  840:                   [{{8,29},erl_lint,{exported_var,'X',{'receive',{2,19}}}},
  841:                    {{9,19},erl_lint,{exported_var,'Y',{'receive',{2,19}}}},
  842:                    {{10,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'B',generate}},
  843:                    {{10,30},erl_lint,{exported_var,'Z',{'receive',{2,19}}}}]}},
  844: 
  845:           {exp3,
  846:            <<"bin(A) ->
  847:                   receive
  848:                       M ->
  849:                            X = M,
  850:                            Y = M,
  851:                            Z = M
  852:                   end,
  853:                   [B || <<B:X>> <- A], % (X exported.)
  854:                   Y = B, % Y exported. B unbound.
  855:                   [B || B <- Z]. % (Z exported.) B shadowed.
  856:            ">>,
  857:            [],
  858:            {error,[{{9,23},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'B'}}],
  859:                   [{{9,19},erl_lint,{exported_var,'Y',{'receive',{2,19}}}},
  860:                    {{10,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'B',generate}}]}},
  861: 
  862:           {exp4,
  863:            <<"t(X) ->
  864:                   if true -> Z = X end,
  865:                   case X of
  866:                       1 -> Z;
  867:                       2 -> X
  868:                   end,
  869:                   Z = X.
  870:            ">>,
  871:            [],
  872:            {warnings,[{{7,19},erl_lint,{exported_var,'Z',{'if',{2,19}}}}]}}
  873:          ],
  874:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
  875:     ok.
  876: 
  877: %% Shadowed variables are tested in other places, but here we test
  878: %% that the warning can be turned off.
  879: shadow_vars(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  880:     Ts = [{shadow1,
  881: 	   <<"bin(A) ->
  882:                   receive
  883:                       M ->
  884:                            X = M,
  885:                            Y = M,
  886:                            Z = M
  887:                   end,
  888:                   [B || <<B:X>> <- A],
  889:                   Y = B,
  890:                   [B || B <- Z]. % B shadowed.
  891:            ">>,
  892: 	   [nowarn_shadow_vars],
  893: 	   {error,[{{9,23},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'B'}}],
  894: 	    [{{9,19},erl_lint,{exported_var,'Y',{'receive',{2,19}}}}]}},
  895:           {shadow2,
  896:            <<"t() ->
  897:                   _ = (catch MS = MS = 1), % MS used unsafe
  898:                   _ = case ok of _ -> fun() -> ok end end,
  899:                   fun (MS) -> MS end. % MS not shadowed here
  900:            ">>,
  901:            [],
  902:            []}],
  903:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
  904:     ok.
  905:

 1609: guard(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1610:     %% Well, these could be plain code...
 1611:     Ts = [{guard1,
 1612:            <<"-record(apa, {}).
 1613:               t(A) when atom(A) ->
 1614:                   atom;
 1615:               t(A) when binary(A) ->
 1616:                   binary;
 1617:               t(A) when constant(A) ->
 1618:                   constant;
 1619:               t(A) when float(A) ->
 1620:                   float;

 1622:                   function;
 1623:               t(A) when integer(A) ->

 2489: %% OTP-15456. All compiler options can now be given in the option list
 2490: %% (as opposed to only in files).
 2491: otp_15456(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2492:     Ts = [
 2493:           %% {nowarn_deprecated_function,[{M,F,A}]} can now be given
 2494:           %% in the option list as well as in an attribute.
 2495:           %% Wherever it occurs, it is not affected by
 2496:           %% warn_deprecated_function.
 2497:           {otp_15456_1,
 2498:            <<"-compile({nowarn_deprecated_function,{erlang,now,0}}).
 2499:               -export([foo/0]).
 2500: 
 2501:               foo() ->
 2502:                   {erlang:now(), random:seed0(), random:seed(1, 2, 3),
 2503:                    random:uniform(), random:uniform(42)}.
 2504:            ">>,
 2505:            {[{nowarn_deprecated_function,{random,seed0,0}},
 2506:              {nowarn_deprecated_function,[{random,uniform,0},
 2507:                                           {random,uniform,1}]},
 2508:              %% There should be no warnings when attempting to
 2509:              %% turn of warnings for functions that are not
 2510:              %% deprecated or not used in the module.
 2511:              {nowarn_deprecated_function,{random,uniform_s,1}},
 2512:              {nowarn_deprecated_function,{erlang,abs,1}},
 2513:              warn_deprecated_function]},
 2514:            {warnings,[{{5,50},erl_lint,
 2515:                        {deprecated,{random,seed,3},
 2516:                         "use the 'rand' module instead"}}]}},
 2517: 
 2518:           %% {nowarn_unused_function,[{M,F,A}]} can be given
 2519:           %% in the option list as well as in an attribute.
 2520:           %% It was incorrectly documented to only work when
 2521:           %% given in an attribute.
 2522:           {otp_15456_2,
 2523:            <<"-compile({nowarn_unused_function,foo/0}).
 2524:               foo() -> ok.
 2525:               bar() -> ok.
 2526:               foobar() -> ok.
 2527:               barf(_) -> ok.
 2528:               other() -> ok.
 2529:            ">>,
 2530:            {[{nowarn_unused_function,[{bar,0},{foobar,0}]},
 2531:              {nowarn_unused_function,{barf,1}},
 2532:              %% There should be no warnings when attempting to
 2533:              %% turn of warnings for unused functions that are not
 2534:              %% defined in the module.
 2535:              {nowarn_unused_function,{not_defined_in_module,1}},
 2536:              warn_unused_function]},
 2537:            {warnings,[{{6,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{other,0}}}]}
 2538:           }],
 2539: 
 2540:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 2541:     ok.

 3169: %% Test warnings for functions that clash with BIFs.
 3170: bif_clash(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3171:     Ts = [{clash1,
 3172:            <<"t(X) ->
 3173:                   size(X).
 3174: 
 3175:               %% No warning for the following calls, since they
 3176:               %% are unambigous.

 3181:                   ?MODULE:size(X).

 3184:                 N.

 3188: 
 3189: 	  %% Verify that warnings cannot be turned off in the old way.
 3190: 	  {clash2,
 3191:            <<"-export([t/1,size/1]).
 3192:               t(X) ->
 3193:                   size(X).
 3194: 
 3195:               size({N,_}) ->
 3196:                 N.
 3197: 
 3198:               %% My own abs/1 function works on lists too. From R14 this really works.
 3199:               abs([H|T]) when $a =< H, H =< $z -> [H-($a-$A)|abs(T)];
 3200:               abs([H|T]) -> [H|abs(T)];
 3201:               abs([]) -> [];
 3202:               abs(X) -> erlang:abs(X).
 3203:              ">>,
 3204: 	   {[nowarn_unused_function,nowarn_bif_clash]},
 3205: 	   {errors,[{erl_lint,disallowed_nowarn_bif_clash}],[]}},
 3206: 	  %% As long as noone calls an overridden BIF, it's totally OK
 3207: 	  {clash3,
 3208:            <<"-export([size/1]).
 3209:               size({N,_}) ->
 3210:                 N;
 3211:               size(X) ->
 3212:                 erlang:size(X).
 3213:              ">>,
 3214: 	   [],
 3215: 	   []},
 3216: 	  %% But this is totally wrong - meaning of the program changed in R14, so this is an error
 3217: 	  {clash4,
 3218:            <<"-export([size/1]).
 3219:               size({N,_}) ->
 3220:                 N;
 3221:               size(X) ->
 3222:                 size(X).
 3223:              ">>,
 3224: 	   [],
 3225: 	   {errors,[{{5,17},erl_lint,{call_to_redefined_old_bif,{size,1}}}],[]}},
 3226: 	  %% For a post R14 bif, its only a warning
 3227: 	  {clash5,
 3228:            <<"-export([binary_part/2]).
 3229:               binary_part({B,_},{X,Y}) ->
 3230:                 binary_part(B,{X,Y});
 3231:               binary_part(B,{X,Y}) ->
 3232:                 binary:part(B,X,Y).
 3233:              ">>,
 3234: 	   [],
 3235: 	   {warnings,[{{3,17},erl_lint,{call_to_redefined_bif,{binary_part,2}}}]}},
 3236: 	  %% If you really mean to call yourself here, you can "unimport" size/1
 3237: 	  {clash6,
 3238:            <<"-export([size/1]).
 3239:               -compile({no_auto_import,[size/1]}).
 3240:               size([]) ->
 3241:                 0;
 3242:               size({N,_}) ->
 3243:                 N;
 3244:               size([_|T]) ->
 3245:                 1+size(T).
 3246:              ">>,
 3247: 	   [],
 3248: 	   []},
 3249: 	  %% Same for the post R14 autoimport warning
 3250: 	  {clash7,
 3251:            <<"-export([binary_part/2]).
 3252:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3253:               binary_part({B,_},{X,Y}) ->
 3254:                 binary_part(B,{X,Y});
 3255:               binary_part(B,{X,Y}) ->
 3256:                 binary:part(B,X,Y).
 3257:              ">>,
 3258: 	   [],
 3259: 	   []},
 3260:           %% but this doesn't mean the local function is allowed in a guard...
 3261: 	  {clash8,
 3262:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3263:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3264:               x(X) when binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= <<1,2>> ->
 3265:                  hej.
 3266:               binary_part({B,_},{X,Y}) ->
 3267:                 binary_part(B,{X,Y});
 3268:               binary_part(B,{X,Y}) ->
 3269:                 binary:part(B,X,Y).
 3270:              ">>,
 3271: 	   [],
 3272: 	   {errors,[{{3,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{binary_part,2}}}],[]}},
 3273:           %% no_auto_import is not like nowarn_bif_clash, it actually removes the autoimport
 3274: 	  {clash9,
 3275:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3276:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3277:               x(X) ->
 3278:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= <<1,2>>.
 3279:              ">>,
 3280: 	   [],
 3281: 	   {errors,[{{4,18},erl_lint,{undefined_function,{binary_part,2}}}],[]}},
 3282:           %% but we could import it again...
 3283: 	  {clash10,
 3284:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3285:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3286:               -import(erlang,[binary_part/2]).
 3287:               x(X) ->
 3288:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= <<1,2>>.
 3289:              ">>,
 3290: 	   [],
 3291: 	   []},
 3292:           %% and actually use it in a guard...
 3293: 	  {clash11,
 3294:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3295:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3296:               -import(erlang,[binary_part/2]).
 3297:               x(X) when binary_part(X,{0,1}) =:= <<0>> ->
 3298:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= <<1,2>>.
 3299:              ">>,
 3300: 	   [],
 3301: 	   []},
 3302:           %% but for non-obvious historical reasons, imported functions cannot be used in
 3303: 	  %% fun construction without the module name...
 3304: 	  {clash12,
 3305:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3306:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3307:               -import(erlang,[binary_part/2]).
 3308:               x(X) when binary_part(X,{0,1}) =:= <<0>> ->
 3309:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= fun binary_part/2.
 3310:              ">>,
 3311: 	   [],
 3312: 	   {errors,[{{5,43},erl_lint,{undefined_function,{binary_part,2}}}],[]}},
 3313:           %% Not from erlang and not from anywhere else
 3314: 	  {clash13,
 3315:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3316:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3317:               -import(x,[binary_part/2]).
 3318:               x(X) ->
 3319:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= fun binary_part/2.
 3320:              ">>,
 3321: 	   [],
 3322: 	   {errors,[{{5,43},erl_lint,{undefined_function,{binary_part,2}}}],[]}},
 3323: 	  %% ...while real auto-import is OK.
 3324: 	  {clash14,
 3325:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3326:               x(X) when binary_part(X,{0,1}) =:= <<0>> ->
 3327:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= fun binary_part/2.
 3328:              ">>,
 3329: 	   [],
 3330: 	   []},
 3331:           %% Import directive clashing with old bif is an error, regardless of if it's called or not
 3332: 	  {clash15,
 3333:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3334:               -import(x,[abs/1]).
 3335:               x(X) ->
 3336:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}).
 3337:              ">>,
 3338: 	   [],
 3339: 	   {errors,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{redefine_old_bif_import,{abs,1}}}],[]}},
 3340: 	  %% For a new BIF, it's only a warning
 3341: 	  {clash16,
 3342:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3343:               -import(x,[binary_part/3]).
 3344:               x(X) ->
 3345:                  abs(X).
 3346:              ">>,
 3347: 	   [],
 3348: 	   {warnings,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{redefine_bif_import,{binary_part,3}}}]}},
 3349: 	  %% And, you cannot redefine already imported things that aren't auto-imported
 3350: 	  {clash17,
 3351:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3352:               -import(x,[binary_port/3]).
 3353:               -import(y,[binary_port/3]).
 3354:               x(X) ->
 3355:                  abs(X).
 3356:              ">>,
 3357: 	   [],
 3358: 	   {errors,[{{3,16},erl_lint,{redefine_import,{{binary_port,3},x}}}],[]}},
 3359: 	  %% Not with local functions either
 3360: 	  {clash18,
 3361:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3362:               -import(x,[binary_port/3]).
 3363:               binary_port(A,B,C) ->
 3364:                  binary_part(A,B,C).
 3365:               x(X) ->
 3366:                  abs(X).
 3367:              ">>,
 3368: 	   [],
 3369: 	   {errors,[{{3,15},erl_lint,{define_import,{binary_port,3}}}],[]}},
 3370: 	  %% Like clash8: Dont accept a guard if it's explicitly module-name called either
 3371: 	  {clash19,
 3372:            <<"-export([binary_port/3]).
 3373:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/3]}).
 3374:               -import(x,[binary_part/3]).
 3375:               binary_port(A,B,C) when x:binary_part(A,B,C) ->
 3376:                  binary_part(A,B,C+1).
 3377:              ">>,
 3378: 	   [],
 3379: 	   {errors,[{{4,39},erl_lint,illegal_guard_expr}],[]}},
 3380: 	  %% Not with local functions either
 3381: 	  {clash20,
 3382:            <<"-export([binary_port/3]).
 3383:               -import(x,[binary_part/3]).
 3384:               binary_port(A,B,C) ->
 3385:                  binary_part(A,B,C).
 3386:              ">>,
 3387: 	   [warn_unused_import],
 3388: 	   {warnings,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{redefine_bif_import,{binary_part,3}}}]}},
 3389: 	  %% Don't accept call to a guard BIF if there is a local definition
 3390: 	  %% or an import with the same name. Note: is_record/2 is an
 3391: 	  %% exception, since it is more of syntatic sugar than a real BIF.
 3392: 	  {clash21,
 3393:            <<"-export([is_list/1]).
 3394:               -import(x, [is_tuple/1]).
 3395:               -record(r, {a,b}).
 3396:               x(T) when is_tuple(T) -> ok;
 3397:               x(T) when is_list(T) -> ok.
 3398:               y(T) when is_tuple(T) =:= true -> ok;
 3399:               y(T) when is_list(T) =:= true -> ok;
 3400:               y(T) when is_record(T, r, 3) -> ok;
 3401:               y(T) when is_record(T, r, 3) =:= true -> ok;
 3402:               y(T) when is_record(T, r) =:= true -> ok.
 3403:               is_list(_) ->
 3404:                 ok.
 3405:               is_record(_, _) ->
 3406:                 ok.
 3407:               is_record(_, _, _) ->
 3408:                 ok.
 3409:              ">>,
 3410: 	   [{no_auto_import,[{is_tuple,1}]}],
 3411: 	   {errors,[{{4,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_tuple,1}}},
 3412: 		    {{5,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_list,1}}},
 3413: 		    {{6,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_tuple,1}}},
 3414: 		    {{7,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_list,1}}},
 3415: 		    {{8,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_record,3}}},
 3416: 		    {{9,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_record,3}}}],[]}},
 3417: 	  %% We can also suppress all auto imports at once
 3418: 	  {clash22,
 3419:           <<"-export([size/1, binary_part/2]).
 3420:              -compile(no_auto_import).
 3421:              size([]) ->
 3422:                0;
 3423:              size({N,_}) ->
 3424:                N;
 3425:              size([_|T]) ->
 3426:                1+size(T).
 3427:              binary_part({B,_},{X,Y}) ->
 3428:                binary_part(B,{X,Y});
 3429:              binary_part(B,{X,Y}) ->
 3430:                binary:part(B,X,Y).
 3431:             ">>,
 3432: 	   [],
 3433: 	   []}
 3434: 	 ],
 3435: 
 3436:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 3437:     ok.
 3438: 
 3439: %% Basic tests with one behaviour.
 3440: behaviour_basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3441:     Ts = [{behaviour1,
 3442:            <<"-behaviour(application).
 3443:              ">>,
 3444:            [],
 3445: 	   {warnings,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{start,2},application}},
 3446: 		      {{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{stop,1},application}}]}},
 3447: 
 3448: 	  {behaviour2,
 3449:            <<"-behaviour(application).
 3450:               -export([stop/1]).
 3451:               stop(_) -> ok.
 3452:              ">>,
 3453:            [],
 3454: 	   {warnings,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{start,2},application}}]}},
 3455: 	  
 3456: 	  {behaviour3,
 3457:            <<"-behavior(application).  %% Test American spelling.
 3458:               -export([start/2,stop/1]).
 3459:               start(_, _) -> ok.
 3460:               stop(_) -> ok.
 3461:              ">>,
 3462:            [],
 3463:            []},
 3464: 
 3465:           {behaviour4,
 3466:            <<"-behavior(application).  %% Test callbacks with export_all
 3467:               -compile([export_all, nowarn_export_all]).
 3468:               stop(_) -> ok.
 3469:              ">>,
 3470:            [],
 3471:            {warnings,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{start,2},application}}]}}
 3472: 	 ],
 3473:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 3474: 
 3475:     Subst = #{behaviour1 => [nowarn_undefined_behaviour_func],
 3476:               behaviour2 => [nowarn_undefined_behaviour_func],
 3477:               behaviour4 => [nowarn_undefined_behaviour_func]},
 3478:     [] = run(Config, rewrite(Ts, Subst)),
 3479:     ok.
 3480: 
 3481: %% Basic tests with multiple behaviours.
 3482: behaviour_multiple(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3483:     Ts = [{behaviour1,
 3484:            <<"-behaviour(application).
 3485:               -behaviour(supervisor).
 3486:              ">>,
 3487:            [],
 3488: 	   {warnings,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{start,2},application}},
 3489: 		      {{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{stop,1},application}},
 3490: 		      {{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{init,1},supervisor}}]}},
 3491: 
 3492: 	  {behaviour2,
 3493:            <<"-behaviour(application).
 3494:               -behaviour(supervisor).
 3495:               -export([start/2,stop/1,init/1]).
 3496:               start(_, _) -> ok.
 3497:               stop(_) -> ok.
 3498:               init(_) -> ok.
 3499:              ">>,
 3500:            [],
 3501: 	   []},
 3502: 
 3503: 	  {american_behavior2,
 3504:            <<"-behavior(application).
 3505:               -behavior(supervisor).
 3506:               -export([start/2,stop/1,init/1]).
 3507:               start(_, _) -> ok.
 3508:               stop(_) -> ok.
 3509:               init(_) -> ok.
 3510:              ">>,
 3511:            [],
 3512: 	   []},
 3513: 
 3514: 	  {behaviour3,
 3515:            <<"-behaviour(gen_server).
 3516:               -behaviour(supervisor).
 3517:               -export([handle_call/3,handle_cast/2,handle_info/2]).
 3518:               handle_call(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3519:               handle_cast(_, _) -> ok.
 3520:               handle_info(_, _) -> ok.
 3521:              ">>,
 3522:            [],
 3523: 	   {warnings,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{init,1},gen_server}},
 3524: 		      {{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{init,1},supervisor}},
 3525: 		      {{2,16},
 3526: 		       erl_lint,
 3527: 		       {conflicting_behaviours,{init,1},supervisor,{1,22},gen_server}}]}},
 3528: 	  {american_behavior3,
 3529:            <<"-behavior(gen_server).
 3530:               -behavior(supervisor).
 3531:               -export([handle_call/3,handle_cast/2,handle_info/2]).
 3532:               handle_call(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3533:               handle_cast(_, _) -> ok.
 3534:               handle_info(_, _) -> ok.
 3535:              ">>,
 3536:            [],
 3537: 	   {warnings,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{init,1},gen_server}},
 3538: 		      {{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{init,1},supervisor}},
 3539: 		      {{2,16},
 3540: 		       erl_lint,
 3541: 		       {conflicting_behaviours,{init,1},supervisor,{1,22},gen_server}}]}},
 3542: 
 3543: 	  {behaviour4,
 3544:            <<"-behaviour(gen_server).
 3545:               -behaviour(gen_statem).
 3546:               -behaviour(supervisor).
 3547:               -export([init/1,handle_call/3,handle_cast/2,
 3548:                        handle_info/2,handle_info/3,
 3549:                        handle_event/3,handle_sync_event/4,
 3550:                        code_change/3,code_change/4,
 3551:                        terminate/2,terminate/3,terminate/4,
 3552:                        callback_mode/0]).
 3553:               init(_) -> ok.
 3554:               handle_call(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3555:               handle_event(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3556:               handle_sync_event(_, _, _, _) -> ok.
 3557:               handle_cast(_, _) -> ok.
 3558:               handle_info(_, _) -> ok.
 3559:               handle_info(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3560:               code_change(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3561:               code_change(_, _, _, _) -> ok.
 3562:               terminate(_, _) -> ok.
 3563:               terminate(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3564:               terminate(_, _, _, _) -> ok.
 3565:               callback_mode() -> state_functions.
 3566:              ">>,
 3567:            [],
 3568: 	   {warnings,[{{2,16},
 3569: 		       erl_lint,
 3570: 		       {conflicting_behaviours,{init,1},gen_statem,{1,22},gen_server}},
 3571: 		      {{3,16},
 3572: 		       erl_lint,
 3573: 		       {conflicting_behaviours,{init,1},supervisor,{1,22},gen_server}}]}}
 3574: 	 ],
 3575:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 3576: 
 3577:     Subst = #{behaviour3 => [nowarn_undefined_behaviour_func,
 3578:                              nowarn_conflicting_behaviours],
 3579:               american_behavior3 => [nowarn_undefined_behaviour_func,
 3580:                                      nowarn_conflicting_behaviours],
 3581:               behaviour4 => [nowarn_conflicting_behaviours]},
 3582:     [] = run(Config, rewrite(Ts, Subst)),
 3583: 
 3584:     ok.
 3585: 
 3586: %% OTP-11861. behaviour_info() and -callback.
 3587: otp_11861(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 3588:     CallbackFiles = [callback1, callback2, callback3,
 3589:                      bad_behaviour1, bad_behaviour2,
 3590:                      bad_behaviour3],
 3591:     lists:foreach(fun(M) ->
 3592:                           F = filename:join(?datadir, M),
 3593:                           Opts = [{outdir,?privdir}, return],
 3594:                           {ok, M, []} = compile:file(F, Opts)
 3595:                   end, CallbackFiles),
 3596:     CodePath = code:get_path(),
 3597:     true = code:add_path(?privdir),
 3598:     Ts = [{otp_11861_1,
 3599:            <<"
 3600:               -export([b1/1]).
 3601:               -behaviour(callback1).
 3602:               -behaviour(callback2).
 3603: 
 3604:               -spec b1(atom()) -> integer().
 3605:               b1(A) when is_atom(A)->
 3606:                   3.
 3607:              ">>,
 3608:            [],
 3609:            %% b2/1 is optional in both modules
 3610:            {warnings,[{{4,16},erl_lint,
 3611:                        {conflicting_behaviours,{b1,1},callback2,{3,16},callback1}}]}},
 3612:           {otp_11861_2,
 3613:            <<"
 3614:               -export([b2/1]).
 3615:               -behaviour(callback1).
 3616:               -behaviour(callback2).
 3617: 
 3618:               -spec b2(integer()) -> atom().
 3619:               b2(I) when is_integer(I)->
 3620:                   a.
 3621:              ">>,
 3622:            [],
 3623:            %% b2/1 is optional in callback2, but not in callback1
 3624:            {warnings,[{{3,16},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{b1,1},callback1}},
 3625:                       {{4,16},erl_lint,
 3626:                        {conflicting_behaviours,{b2,1},callback2,{3,16},callback1}}]}},
 3627:           {otp_11861_3,
 3628:            <<"
 3629:               -callback b(_) -> atom().
 3630:               -optional_callbacks({b1,1}). % non-existing and ignored
 3631:              ">>,
 3632:            [],
 3633:            []},
 3634:           {otp_11861_4,
 3635:            <<"
 3636:               -callback b(_) -> atom().
 3637:               -optional_callbacks([{b1,1}]). % non-existing
 3638:              ">>,
 3639:            [],
 3640:            %% No behaviour-info(), but callback.
 3641:            {errors,[{{3,16},erl_lint,{undefined_callback,{lint_test,b1,1}}}],[]}},
 3642:           {otp_11861_5,
 3643:            <<"
 3644:               -optional_callbacks([{b1,1}]). % non-existing
 3645:              ">>,
 3646:            [],
 3647:            %% No behaviour-info() and no callback: warning anyway
 3648:            {errors,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_callback,{lint_test,b1,1}}}],[]}},
 3649:           {otp_11861_6,
 3650:            <<"
 3651:               -optional_callbacks([b1/1]). % non-existing
 3652:               behaviour_info(callbacks) -> [{b1,1}].
 3653:              ">>,
 3654:            [],
 3655:            %% behaviour-info() and no callback: warning anyway
 3656:            {errors,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_callback,{lint_test,b1,1}}}],[]}},
 3657:           {otp_11861_7,
 3658:            <<"
 3659:               -optional_callbacks([b1/1]). % non-existing
 3660:               -callback b(_) -> atom().
 3661:               behaviour_info(callbacks) -> [{b1,1}].
 3662:              ">>,
 3663:            [],
 3664:            %% behaviour-info() callback: warning
 3665:            {errors,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_callback,{lint_test,b1,1}}},
 3666:                     {{3,16},erl_lint,{behaviour_info,{lint_test,b,1}}}],
 3667:             []}},
 3668:           {otp_11861_8,
 3669:            <<"
 3670:               -callback b(_) -> atom().
 3671:               -optional_callbacks([b/1, {b, 1}]).
 3672:              ">>,
 3673:            [],
 3674:            {errors,[{{3,16},erl_lint,{redefine_optional_callback,{b,1}}}],[]}},
 3675:           {otp_11861_9,
 3676:            <<"
 3677:               -behaviour(gen_server).
 3678:               -export([handle_call/3,handle_cast/2,handle_info/2,
 3679:                        code_change/3, init/1, terminate/2]).
 3680:               handle_call(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3681:               handle_cast(_, _) -> ok.
 3682:               handle_info(_, _) -> ok.
 3683:               code_change(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3684:               init(_) -> ok.
 3685:               terminate(_, _) -> ok.
 3686:              ">>,
 3687:            [],
 3688:            %% Nothing...
 3689:            []},
 3690:           {otp_11861_9,
 3691:            <<"
 3692:               -behaviour(gen_server).
 3693:               -export([handle_call/3,handle_cast/2,handle_info/2,
 3694:                        code_change/3, init/1, terminate/2,
 3695:                        format_status/1, format_status/2]).
 3696:               handle_call(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3697:               handle_cast(_, _) -> ok.
 3698:               handle_info(_, _) -> ok.
 3699:               code_change(_, _, _) -> ok.
 3700:               init(_) -> ok.
 3701:               terminate(_, _) -> ok.
 3702:               format_status(_) -> ok. % optional callback
 3703:               format_status(_, _) -> ok. % deprecated optional callback
 3704:              ">>,
 3705:            [],
 3706:            {warnings,[{{2,16},
 3707:                        erl_lint,
 3708:                        {deprecated_callback,{gen_server,format_status,2},
 3709:                         "use format_status/1 instead"}}]}},
 3710:           {otp_11861_10,
 3711:            <<"
 3712:               -optional_callbacks([{b1,1,bad}]). % badly formed and ignored
 3713:               behaviour_info(callbacks) -> [{b1,1}].
 3714:              ">>,
 3715:            [],
 3716:            []},
 3717:           {otp_11861_11,
 3718:            <<"
 3719:               -behaviour(bad_behaviour1).
 3720:              ">>,
 3721:            [],
 3722:            {warnings,[{{2,16},erl_lint,
 3723:                        {ill_defined_behaviour_callbacks,bad_behaviour1}}]}},
 3724:           {otp_11861_12,
 3725:            <<"
 3726:               -behaviour(non_existing_behaviour).
 3727:              ">>,
 3728:            [],
 3729:            {warnings,[{{2,16},erl_lint,
 3730:                        {undefined_behaviour,non_existing_behaviour}}]}},
 3731:           {otp_11861_13,
 3732:            <<"
 3733:               -behaviour(bad_behaviour_none).
 3734:              ">>,
 3735:            [],
 3736:            {warnings,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour,bad_behaviour_none}}]}},

 3738:            <<"
 3739:               -callback b(_) -> atom().
 3740:              ">>,
 3741:            [],
 3742:            []},

 3744:            <<"
 3745:               -optional_callbacks([{b1,1,bad}]). % badly formed
 3746:               -callback b(_) -> atom().
 3747:              ">>,
 3748:            [],
 3749:            []},
 3750:           {otp_11861_16,
 3751:            <<"
 3752:               -callback b(_) -> atom().
 3753:               -callback b(_) -> atom().
 3754:              ">>,
 3755:            [],
 3756:            {errors,[{{3,16},erl_lint,{redefine_callback,{b,1}}}],[]}},

 3758:            <<"
 3759:               -behaviour(bad_behaviour2).
 3760:              ">>,
 3761:            [],
 3762:            {warnings,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_callbacks,
 3763:                                    bad_behaviour2}}]}},
 3764:           {otp_11861_18,
 3765:            <<"
 3766:               -export([f1/1]).
 3767:               -behaviour(callback3).
 3768:               f1(_) -> ok.
 3769:              ">>,
 3770:            [],
 3771:            []},
 3772:

 3774:            <<"
 3775:               -export([good/1]).
 3776:               -behaviour(bad_behaviour3).
 3777:               good(_) -> ok.
 3778:              ">>,
 3779:            [],
 3780:            {warnings,[{{3,16},erl_lint,{ill_defined_optional_callbacks,bad_behaviour3}}]}}
 3781: 	 ],
 3782:     [] = run(Conf, Ts),
 3783: 
 3784:     Subst = #{otp_11861_1 => [nowarn_conflicting_behaviours],

 3789:               otp_11861_19 => [nowarn_ill_defined_optional_callbacks]
 3790:              },
 3791:     [] = run(Conf, rewrite(Ts, Subst)),
 3792:

 3837: %% Bugfix: -opaque with invalid type.
 3838: otp_8051(Config) when is_list(Config) ->

 3847: 
 3848: %% Check that format warnings are generated.
 3849: format_warn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3850:     L1 = 23,
 3851:     L2 = 5,
 3852:     format_level(1, L1, Config),
 3853:     format_level(2, L1+L2, Config),
 3854:     format_level(3, L1+L2, Config),             %there is no level 3
 3855:     ok.
 3856: 
 3857: format_level(Level, Count, Config) ->
 3858:     W = get_compilation_result(Config, "format",
 3859:                                      [{warn_format, Level}]),
 3860:     %% Pick out the 'format' warnings.
 3861:     FW = lists:filter(fun({_Line, erl_lint, {format_error, _}}) -> true;
 3862:                                (_) -> false
 3863:                             end,
 3864:                             W),
 3865:     case length(FW) of
 3866:               Count ->
 3867:                   ok;
 3868:               Other ->
 3869:                   io:format("Expected ~w warning(s); got ~w", [Count,Other]),
 3870:                   fail()
 3871:           end,
 3872:     ok.
 3873:

 3878:     Ts = [{on_load_1,

 3891:              ">>,

 3900:              bar(N) -> 2*N.

 4258:            t(#{} = M) ->
 4259:                #{K1 := V1} =
 4260:                #{K2 := V2} =
 4261:                #{k1 := K1,k2 := K2} = M,
 4262:                [V1,V2].
 4263:            ">>,
 4264:            [],
 4265:            []},
 4266:           {parallel_map_patterns_literal,
 4267:            <<"
 4268:            t(#{} = M) ->
 4269:                #{k1 := V1} =
 4270:                #{k2 := V2} =
 4271:                #{k1 := V1,k2 := V2} = M,
 4272:                [V1,V2].
 4273:            ">>,
 4274:            [],
 4275:            []}],
 4276:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 4277:     ok.

 4281:     Ts = [

 4283: 	 <<"-export([t/0]).
 4284:             -type range(A, B) :: A | B.
 4285:

 4289:

 4365: %% OTP-11879: The -spec f/a :: (As) -> B; syntax removed,
 4366: %% and is_subtype/2 deprecated.
 4367: otp_11879(_Config) ->
 4368:     Fs = [{attribute,0,file,{"file.erl",0}},
 4369:           {attribute,0,module,m},
 4370:           {attribute,1,spec,
 4371:            {{f,1},
 4372:             [{type,2,'fun',[{type,3,product,[{var,4,'V1'},
 4373:                                              {var,5,'V1'}]},
 4374:                             {type,6,integer,[]}]}]}},
 4375:           {attribute,20,callback,
 4376:            {{cb,21},
 4377:             [{type,22,'fun',[{type,23,product,[{var,24,'V1'},
 4378:                                                {var,25,'V1'}]},
 4379:                              {type,6,integer,[]}]}]}}],
 4380:     {error,[{"file.erl",
 4381:              [{1,erl_lint,{spec_fun_undefined,{f,1}}},
 4382:               {2,erl_lint,spec_wrong_arity},
 4383:               {22,erl_lint,callback_wrong_arity}]}],
 4384:      []} = compile_forms(Fs, [return,report]),
 4385:     ok.
 4386: 
 4387: compile_forms(Terms, Opts) ->
 4388:     Forms = [erl_parse:anno_from_term(Term) || Term <- Terms],
 4389:     compile:forms(Forms, Opts).
 4390:

 4394:     {errors,[{{1,2},erl_lint,undefined_module},
 4395:              {{1,2},erl_lint,{bad_deprecated,{frutt,0}}}],
 4396:      []} = run_test2(Config, Abstr, []),
 4397:     ok.

 4459: %% OTP-14285: We currently don't support non-latin1 module names.
 4460: 
 4461: non_latin1_module(Config) ->
 4462:     Expected = [non_latin1_module_unsupported],
 4463:     Expected = check_module_name('юникод'),
 4464:     Expected = check_module_name(list_to_atom([256,$a,$b,$c])),
 4465:     Expected = check_module_name(list_to_atom([$a,$b,256,$c])),
 4466: 
 4467:     "module names with non-latin1 characters are not supported" =
 4468:         format_error(non_latin1_module_unsupported),
 4469:     BadCallback =
 4470:         {bad_callback,{'кирилли́ческий атом','кирилли́ческий атом',0}},
 4471:     BadModule =
 4472:         {bad_module,{'кирилли́ческий атом','кирилли́ческий атом',0}},
 4473:     "explicit module not allowed for callback "
 4474:     "'кирилли́ческий атом':'кирилли́ческий атом'/0" =
 4475:         format_error(BadCallback),
 4476:     UndefBehav = {undefined_behaviour,'кирилли́ческий атом'},
 4477:     "behaviour 'кирилли́ческий атом' undefined" =
 4478:         format_error(UndefBehav),
 4479:     Ts = [{non_latin1_module,
 4480:            <<"
 4481:             %% Report uses of module names with non-Latin-1 characters.
 4482: 
 4483:             -import('кирилли́ческий атом', []).
 4484:             -behaviour('кирилли́ческий атом').
 4485:             -behavior('кирилли́ческий атом').
 4486: 
 4487:             -callback 'кирилли́ческий атом':'кирилли́ческий атом'() -> a.
 4488: 
 4489:             %% erl_lint:gexpr/3 is not extended to check module name here:
 4490:             t1() when 'кирилли́ческий атом':'кирилли́ческий атом'(1) ->
 4491:                 b.
 4492: 
 4493:             t2() ->
 4494:                 'кирилли́ческий атом':'кирилли́ческий атом'().
 4495: 
 4496:             -spec 'кирилли́ческий атом':'кирилли́ческий атом'() -> atom().
 4497: 
 4498:             -spec 'кирилли́ческий атом'(integer()) ->
 4499:               'кирилли́ческий атом':'кирилли́ческий атом'().
 4500: 
 4501:             'кирилли́ческий атом'(1) ->
 4502:                 'кирилли́ческий атом':f(),
 4503:                 F = f,
 4504:                 'кирилли́ческий атом':F()."/utf8>>,
 4505:            [],
 4506:            {error,
 4507:             [{{4,14},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4508:              {{5,14},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4509:              {{6,14},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4510:              {{8,14},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4511:              {{8,14},erl_lint,BadCallback},
 4512:              {{11,23},erl_lint,illegal_guard_expr},
 4513:              {{15,17},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4514:              {{17,14},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4515:              {{17,14},erl_lint,BadModule},
 4516:              {{20,15},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4517:              {{23,17},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4518:              {{25,17},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported}],
 4519:             [{{5,14},erl_lint,UndefBehav},
 4520:              {{6,14},erl_lint,UndefBehav}]}}],
 4521:     run(Config, Ts),
 4522:     ok.
 4523: 
 4524: illegal_module_name(_Config) ->
 4525:     [empty_module_name] = check_module_name(''),
 4526: 
 4527:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('\x00'),
 4528:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('abc\x1F'),
 4529:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('\x7F'),
 4530:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('abc\x80'),
 4531:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('abc\x80xyz'),
 4532:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('\x9Fxyz'),
 4533: 
 4534:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name,
 4535:      non_latin1_module_unsupported] = check_module_name('атом\x00'),
 4536: 
 4537:     [blank_module_name] = check_module_name(' '),
 4538:     [blank_module_name] = check_module_name('\xA0'),
 4539:     [blank_module_name] = check_module_name('\xAD'),
 4540:     [blank_module_name] = check_module_name('  \xA0\xAD '),
 4541: 
 4542:     %% White space and soft hyphens are OK if there are visible
 4543:     %% characters in the name.
 4544:     ok = check_module_name(' abc '),
 4545:     ok = check_module_name('abc '),
 4546:     ok = check_module_name(' abc '),
 4547:     ok = check_module_name(' abc xyz '),
 4548:     ok = check_module_name(' abc\xADxyz '),
 4549: 
 4550:     ok.
 4551: 
 4552: check_module_name(Mod) ->
 4553:     File = atom_to_list(Mod) ++ ".erl",
 4554:     L1 = erl_anno:new(1),
 4555:     Forms = [{attribute,L1,file,{File,1}},
 4556:              {attribute,L1,module,Mod},
 4557:              {eof,2}],
 4558:     _ = compile:forms(Forms),
 4559:     case compile:forms(Forms, [return]) of
 4560:         {error,Errors,[]} ->
 4561:             [{_ModName,L}] = Errors,
 4562:             lists:sort([Reason || {1,erl_lint,Reason} <- L]);
 4563:         {ok,Mod,Code,Ws} when is_binary(Code), is_list(Ws)  ->
 4564:             ok
 4565:     end.
 4566:

 4568:     Ts = [
 4569:           {otp_14378_1,
 4570:            <<"-export([t/0]).
 4571:               -compile({nowarn_deprecated_function,{erlang,now,1}}).
 4572:               t() ->
 4573:                  erlang:now().">>,
 4574:            [],
 4575:            {warnings,[{{4,18},erl_lint,
 4576:                        {deprecated,{erlang,now,0},
 4577:                         "see the \"Time and Time Correction in Erlang\" "
 4578:                         "chapter of the ERTS User's Guide for more "
 4579:                         "information"}}]}}],
 4580:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 4581:     ok.

 4642:                   Stk = [],
 4643:                   try error(foo)
 4644:                   catch _:_:Stk -> ok
 4645:                   end.
 4646:            ">>,
 4647:            [],
 4648:            {errors,[{{4,29},erl_lint,{stacktrace_bound,'Stk'}}],[]}},

 4651:                   try error(foo)
 4652:                   catch _:{x,T}:T -> ok
 4653:                   end.
 4654:            ">>,

 4661:                   catch _:_:Stk when is_integer(Stk) -> ok
 4662:                   end.

 4775: 
 4776: one_multi_init(Config) ->
 4777:     "'_' initializes no omitted fields" =
 4778:         format_error(bad_multi_field_init),
 4779:     Ts = [{otp_16516_1,
 4780:            <<"-record(r, {f}).
 4781:               t(#r{f = 17, _ = V}) ->
 4782:                   V.
 4783:               u(#r{_ = V, f = 17}) ->
 4784:                   V.
 4785:               -record(r1, {f, g = 17}).
 4786:               g(#r1{f = 3, _ = 42}) ->
 4787:                 g.
 4788:              ">>,
 4789:            [],
 4790:            {errors,[{{2,28},erl_lint,bad_multi_field_init},
 4791:                     {{4,20},erl_lint,bad_multi_field_init}],[]}},
 4792:           {otp_16516_2,
 4793:            %% No error since "_ = '_'" is actually used as a catch-all
 4794:            %% initialization. V is unused (as compilation with the 'E'
 4795:            %% option shows), but no warning about V being unused is
 4796:            %% output.
 4797:            <<"-record(r, {f}).
 4798:               t(V) ->
 4799:                   #r{f = 3, _ = V}.
 4800:               u(V) ->
 4801:                   #r{_ = V, f = 3}.
 4802:              ">>,
 4803:            [],
 4804:            []},
 4805:           {otp_16516_3,
 4806:            %% No error in this case either. And no unused variable warning.
 4807:            <<"-record(r, {f}).
 4808:               t(V) when #r{f = 3, _ = V} =:= #r{f = 3} ->
 4809:                   a.
 4810:               u(V) when #r{_ = V, f = 3} =:= #r{f = 3} ->
 4811:                   a.
 4812:              ">>,
 4813:            [],
 4814:            []}],
 4815:     [] = run(Config, Ts).
 4816: 
 4817: several_multi_inits(Config) ->
 4818:     Ts = [{otp_16516_4,
 4819:            <<"-record(r, {f, g}).
 4820:               t(#r{f = 17, _ = V1,
 4821:                            _ = V2}) ->
 4822:                   {V1, V2}.
 4823:               u(#r{_ = V1, f = 17,
 4824:                    _ = V2}) ->
 4825:                   {V1, V2}.
 4826:               v(#r{_ = V1, f = 17}) ->
 4827:                   V1.
 4828:              ">>,
 4829:            [],

 4831:                     {{4,20},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'V1'}},

 4911: warn_missing_spec(Config) ->
 4912:     Test = ~"""

 4918:

 4920:

 4922: -doc hidden.
 4923: hidden_with_spec() -> ok.
 4924: 
 4925: -doc hidden.
 4926: hidden_no_spec() -> ok.
 4927:

 4929: internal_with_spec() -> ok.
 4930: 
 4931: internal_no_spec() -> ok.
 4932: """,
 4933: 
 4934:     %% Be sure to avoid adding export_all using the option-list-in-a-tuple trick.
 4935:     {warnings, [{{7,1}, erl_lint, {missing_spec, {external_no_spec, 0}}}]} =
 4936:         run_test(Config, Test, {[warn_missing_spec_documented, nowarn_unused_function]}),

 4998: underscore_match(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4999:     Test = <<"
 5000:                 match_underscore() ->
 5001:                     _Test = id(13),
 5002:                     case id(_Test) of               %% Usage: no warning.
 5003:                         _Test -> handle:msg(_Test)  %% Match: warning.
 5004:                     end.
 5005: 
 5006:                 f(_A, _A, _A) ->                    %% Match: warning.
 5007:                     _A.                             %% Usage: no warning.
 5008: 
 5009:                 t(_T, _T) ->                            %% Match: warning.
 5010:                     case _T of                          %% Usage: no warning.
 5011:                         {_T,_T} ->                      %% Match: warning.
 5012:                             {_T,_T} =                   %% Match: warning.
 5013:                                 fun(_T1, _T1) ->        %% Match: warning.
 5014:                                         {_T,_T} = _T1   %% Match: warning.
 5015:                                 end,
 5016:                         [_T = T2 || T2 <- _T],          %% Match: warning.
 5017:                         [{_T,_T} || _ <- _T]            %% Usage: no warning.
 5018:                     end.
 5019: 
 5020:                 id(I) -> I.
 5021:            ">>,

 5143: %% Test maybe ... else ... end.
 5144: eep49(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5145:     EnableMaybe = {feature,maybe_expr,enable},
 5146:     Ts = [{exp1,
 5147:            <<"t(X) ->
 5148:                   maybe
 5149:                       A = X()
 5150:                   end,
 5151:                   A.
 5152:            ">>,
 5153:            [EnableMaybe],
 5154:            {errors,[{{5,19},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'A',{'maybe',{2,19}}}}],
 5155:             []}},
 5156: 
 5157:           {exp2,
 5158:            <<"t(X) ->
 5159:                   maybe
 5160:                       A = X()
 5161:                   else
 5162:                       _ -> {ok,A}
 5163:                   end,
 5164:                   A.
 5165:            ">>,
 5166:            [EnableMaybe],
 5167:            {errors,[{{5,32},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'A',{'maybe',{2,19}}}},
 5168:                     {{7,19},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'A',{'maybe',{2,19}}}}],
 5169:             []}},
 5170: 
 5171:           {exp3,
 5172:            <<"t(X) ->
 5173:                   maybe
 5174:                       X()
 5175:                   else
 5176:                       A ->
 5177:                           B = 42,
 5178:                           {error,A}
 5179:                   end,
 5180:                   {A,B}.
 5181:            ">>,
 5182:            [EnableMaybe],
 5183:            {errors,[{{9,20},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'A',{'else',{4,19}}}},
 5184:                     {{9,22},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'B',{'else',{4,19}}}}],
 5185:             []}},
 5186: 
 5187:           {exp4,
 5188:            <<"t(X) ->
 5189:                   maybe
 5190:                       X()
 5191:                   else
 5192:                       ok ->
 5193:                           A = 42;
 5194:                       error ->
 5195:                           error
 5196:                   end,
 5197:                   A.
 5198:            ">>,
 5199:            [EnableMaybe],
 5200:            {errors,[{{10,19},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'A',{'else',{4,19}}}}],
 5201:             []}},
 5202: 
 5203:           %% Using '?=' not at the top-level of a 'maybe' ... 'else' is forbidden.
 5204:           {illegal_maybe_match1,
 5205:            <<"t(X) ->
 5206:                   maybe (ok ?= X()) end.
 5207:            ">>,
 5208:            [EnableMaybe],
 5209:            {errors,[{{2,29},erl_parse,["syntax error before: ","'?='"]}],[]}},
 5210:           {illegal_maybe_match2,
 5211:            <<"t(X) ->
 5212:                   ok ?= X().
 5213:            ">>,
 5214:            [EnableMaybe],
 5215:            {errors,[{{2,22},erl_parse,["syntax error before: ","'?='"]}],[]}}
 5216:          ],
 5217: 
 5218:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 5219:     ok.
