 5302:            <<"-type function() :: {function, fun(() -> atom())}.
 5303:              ">>,
 5304:            [],
 5305:            {warnings,[{{1,22},erl_lint,
 5306:                        {redefine_builtin_type,{function,0}}},
 5307:                       {{1,22},erl_lint,
 5308:                        {unused_type,{function,0}}}]}},
 5309:           {redef9,
 5310:            <<"-spec foo() -> fun().
 5311:               foo() -> fun() -> ok end.
 5312:              ">>,
 5313:            [],
 5314:            []}
 5315:          ],
 5316:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 5317:     ok.
 5318: 
 5319: tilde_k(Config) ->
 5320:     Ts = [{tilde_k_1,
 5321:            <<"t(Map) ->
 5322:                   io:format(\"~kp\n\", [Map]),
 5323:                   io:format(\"~kP\n\", [Map,10]),
 5324:                   io:format(\"~kw\n\", [Map]),
 5325:                   io:format(\"~kW\n\", [Map,5]),
 5326:                   io:format(\"~tkp\n\", [Map]),
 5327:                   io:format(\"~klp\n\", [Map]),
 5328:                   RevCmpFun = fun erlang:'>='/2,
 5329:                   io:format(\"~Kp\n\", [RevCmpFun,Map]),
 5330:                   io:format(\"~KP\n\", [RevCmpFun,Map,10]),
 5331:                   io:format(\"~Kw\n\", [RevCmpFun,Map]),
 5332:                   io:format(\"~KW\n\", [RevCmpFun,Map,5]),
 5333:                   ok.">>,
 5334:            [],
 5335:            []},
 5336:           {tilde_k_2,
 5337:            <<"t(Map) ->
 5338:                   io:format(\"~kkp\n\", [Map]),
 5339:                   io:format(\"~kKp\n\", [Map]),
 5340:                   io:format(\"~ks\n\", [Map]),
 5341:                   ok.">>,
 5342:            [],
 5343:            {warnings,
 5344:             [{{2,29},
 5345:               erl_lint,
 5346:               {format_error,{"format string invalid (~ts)",
 5347:                              ["repeated modifier k"]}}},
 5348:              {{4,29},
 5349:               erl_lint,
 5350:               {format_error,{"format string invalid (~ts)",
 5351:                              ["conflicting modifiers ~Kkp"]}}},
 5352:              {{6,29},
 5353:               erl_lint,
 5354:               {format_error,{"format string invalid (~ts)",
 5355:                              ["invalid modifier/control combination ~ks"]}}}]}
 5356:           }
 5357:          ],
 5358:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 5359: 
 5360:     ok.
 5361: 
 5362: match_float_zero(Config) ->
 5363:     Ts = [{float_zero_1,
 5364:            <<"t(+0.0) -> ok.\n"
 5365:              "k(-0.0) -> ok.\n">>,
 5366:            [],
 5367:            []},
 5368:           {float_zero_2,
 5369:            <<"t(0.0) -> ok.\n"
 5370:              "k({0.0}) -> ok.\n">>,
 5371:            [],
 5372:            {warnings,[{{1,23},erl_lint,match_float_zero},
 5373:                       {{2,4},erl_lint,match_float_zero}]}},
 5374:           {float_zero_3,
 5375:            <<"t(A) when A =:= 0.0 -> ok;\n" %% Should warn.
 5376:              "t(A) when A =:= {0.0} -> ok.\n" %% Should warn.
 5377:              "k(A) -> A =:= 0.0.\n" %% Should warn.
 5378:              "q(A) -> A =:= {0.0}.\n" %% Should warn.
 5379:              "z(A) when A =:= +0.0 -> ok;\n" %% Should not warn.
 5380:              "z(A) when A =:= {+0.0} -> ok.\n">>, %% Should not warn.
 5381:            [],
 5382:            {warnings,[{{1,37},erl_lint,match_float_zero},
 5383:                       {{2,18},erl_lint,match_float_zero},
 5384:                       {{3,15},erl_lint,match_float_zero},
 5385:                       {{4,16},erl_lint,match_float_zero}]}}
 5386:          ],
 5387:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 5388: 
 5389:     ok.
 5390: 
 5391: %% GH-7655. When the module definition was missing, spurious
 5392: %% diagnostics would be emitted for each spec.
 5393: undefined_module(Config) ->
 5394:     Code = <<"-spec foo() -> 'ok'.
 5395:               foo() -> ok.
 5396:              ">>,
 5397:     {errors,[{{1,2},erl_lint,undefined_module}],[]} = run_test2(Config, Code, []),
 5398: 
 5399:     ok.
 5400: 
 5401: update_literal(Config) ->
 5402:     Ts = [{update_record_literal,
 5403:            <<"-record(a, {b}).
 5404:              t() -> #a{}#a{}#a{b=aoeu}.
 5405:              k() -> A = #a{}, A#a{}#a{b=aoeu}.">>,
 5406:            [],
 5407:            {warnings,[{{2,25},erl_lint,update_literal},
 5408:                       {{2,29},erl_lint,update_literal}]}},
 5409:           {update_map_literal_assoc,
 5410:            <<"t() -> #{}#{}#{b=>aoeu}.
 5411:               k() -> A = #{}, A#{}#{b=>aoeu}.">>,
 5412:            [],
 5413:            {warnings,[{{1,31},erl_lint,update_literal},
 5414:                       {{1,34},erl_lint,update_literal}]}},
 5415:           {update_map_literal_exact,
 5416:            <<"t() -> #{}#{}#{b:=aoeu}.
 5417:               k() -> A = #{}, A#{}#{b:=aoeu}.">>,
 5418:            [],
 5419:            {warnings,[{{1,31},erl_lint,update_literal},
 5420:                       {{1,34},erl_lint,update_literal}]}}
 5421:          ],
 5422:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 5423: 
 5424:     ok.
 5425: 
 5426: %% For certain kinds of errors that are easily caused by typos, error 
 5427: %% messages try to suggest fixes according to jaro_similarity.
 5428: messages_with_jaro_suggestions(Config) ->
 5429:     Ts = [{on_load_fun,
 5430:            <<"-on_load(foa/0).
 5431:               foo() -> ok.">>,
 5432:            {[]},
 5433:            {error,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_on_load,{foa,0},"foo"}}],
 5434:             [{{2,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{foo,0}}}]}},
 5435:           {undefined_nif,
 5436:            <<"-export([foo/1]).
 5437:               -nifs([foa/1]).
 5438:               -on_load(init/0).
 5439:               init() ->
 5440:                   ok = erlang:load_nif(\"./example_nif\", 0).
 5441:               foo(_X) ->
 5442:                   erlang:nif_error(nif_library_not_loaded).">>,
 5443:            {[]},
 5444:            {errors,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_nif,{foa,1},"foo"}}],[]}},
 5445:           {record_and_field,
 5446:            <<"-record(meep, { moo, muu }).
 5447:               t(State) ->
 5448:                   Var = State#meep.mo,
 5449:                   State#mee{ moo = Var }.">>,
 5450:            {[]},
 5451:            {error,[{{3,36},erl_lint,{undefined_field,meep,mo,"moo"}},
 5452:                    {{4,24},erl_lint,{undefined_record,mee,"meep"}}],
 5453:             [{{2,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{t,1}}},
 5454:              {{3,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Var'}}]}},
 5455:           {unbound_var,
 5456:            <<"-record(meep, { moo, muu }).
 5457:               t(State) ->
 5458:                   Var = State#meep.moo,
 5459:                   Stat#meep{ moo = Var }.">>,
 5460:            {[]},
 5461:            {error,[{{4,19},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'Stat',"State"}}],
 5462:             [{{2,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{t,1}}}]}},
 5463:           {undefined_fun,
 5464:            <<"-export([bar/1]).
 5465:               baz(X) -> X.">>,
 5466:            {[]},
 5467:            {error,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{undefined_function,{bar,1},"baz"}}],
 5468:             [{{2,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{baz,1}}}]}},
 5469:           {nowarn_undefined_fun,
 5470:            <<"-compile({nowarn_unused_function,[{an_not_used,1}]}).
 5471:               and_not_used(_) -> foo.">>,
 5472:            {[]},
 5473:            {error,[{{1,22}, erl_lint,
 5474:                     {bad_nowarn_unused_function,{an_not_used,1},"and_not_used"}}],
 5475:             [{{2,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{and_not_used,1}}}]}},
 5476:           {bad_inline,
 5477:            <<"-compile({inline, {go,1}}).
 5478:               gi(A) -> {A}.">>,
 5479:            {[]},
 5480:            {error,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{bad_inline,{go,1},"gi"}}],
 5481:             [{{2,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{gi,1}}}]}}
 5482:          ],
 5483:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 5484: 
 5485:     ok.
 5486: 
 5487: %%%
 5488: %%% Common utilities.
 5489: %%%
 5490: 
 5491: rewrite([{Name,Code,[],{warnings,_}}=H|T], Subst) ->
 5492:     case Subst of
 5493:         #{Name := Opts} ->
 5494:             io:format("~s: testing with options ~p\n", [Name,Opts]),
 5495:             [{Name,Code,Opts,[]}|rewrite(T, Subst)];
 5496:         #{} ->
 5497:             [H|rewrite(T, Subst)]
 5498:     end;
 5499: rewrite([H|T], Subst) ->
 5500:     [H|rewrite(T, Subst)];
 5501: rewrite([], _Subst) ->
 5502:     [].
 5503: 
 5504: format_error(E) ->
 5505:     lists:flatten(erl_lint:format_error(E)).
 5506: 
 5507: run(Config, Tests) ->
 5508:     F = fun({N,P,Ws,E}, BadL) ->
 5509:                 io:format("### ~s\n", [N]),
 5510:                 case catch run_test(Config, P, Ws) of
 5511:                     E -> 
 5512:                         BadL;
 5513:                     Bad -> 
 5514:                         io:format("~nTest ~p failed. Expected~n  ~p~n"
 5515:                                   "but got~n  ~p~n", [N, E, Bad]),
 5516: 			fail()
 5517:                 end
 5518:         end,
 5519:     lists:foldl(F, [], Tests).
 5520: 
 5521: %% Compiles a test file and returns the list of warnings/errors.
 5522: 
 5523: get_compilation_result(Conf, Filename, Warnings) ->
 5524:     DataDir = ?datadir,
 5525:     File = filename:join(DataDir, Filename),
 5526:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(File++".erl"),
 5527:     FileS = binary_to_list(Bin),
 5528:     {match,[{Start,Length}|_]} = re:run(FileS, "-module.*\\n"),
 5529:     Test = lists:nthtail(Start+Length, FileS),
 5530:     case run_test(Conf, Test, Warnings) of
 5531:         {warnings, Ws} -> Ws;
 5532:         {errors,Es,Ws} -> {Es,Ws};
 5533:         [] -> []
 5534:     end.
 5535: 
 5536: %% Compiles a test module and returns the list of errors and warnings.
 5537: 
 5538: run_test(Conf, Test0, Warnings0) ->
 5539:     Test = list_to_binary(["-module(lint_test). ", Test0]),
 5540:     run_test2(Conf, Test, Warnings0).
 5541: 
 5542: run_test2(Conf, Test, Warnings0) ->
 5543:     Filename = "lint_test.erl",
 5544:     DataDir = ?privdir,
 5545:     File = filename:join(DataDir, Filename),
 5546:     Opts = case Warnings0 of
 5547:                {Warnings} ->		%Hairy trick to not add export_all.
 5548:                    [return|Warnings];
 5549:                Warnings ->
 5550:                    [export_all,return|Warnings]
 5551:            end,
 5552:     ok = file:write_file(File, Test),
 5553: 
 5554:     %% We will use the 'binary' option so that the compiler will not
 5555:     %% compare the module name to the output file name. Also, there
 5556:     %% is no reason to produce an output file since we are only
 5557:     %% interested in the errors and warnings.
 5558: 
 5559:     %% Print warnings, call erl_lint:format_error/1. (But note that
 5560:     %% the compiler will ignore failing calls to erl_lint:format_error/1.)
 5561:     compile:file(File, [binary,report|Opts]),
 5562: 
 5563:     case compile:file(File, [binary|Opts]) of
 5564:         {ok, _M, Code, Ws} when is_binary(Code) ->
 5565:             warnings(File, Ws, Test);
 5566:         {error, [{File,Es}], []} ->
 5567:             print_diagnostics(Es, Test),
 5568: 	    {errors, call_format_error(Es), []};
 5569:         {error, [{File,Es}], [{File,Ws}]} ->
 5570:             print_diagnostics(Es, Test),
 5571:             print_diagnostics(Ws, Test),
 5572: 	    {error, call_format_error(Es), call_format_error(Ws)};
 5573:         {error, [{File,Es1},{File,Es2}], []} ->
 5574:             print_diagnostics(Es1, Test),
 5575:             print_diagnostics(Es2, Test),
 5576: 	    {errors2, Es1, Es2}
 5577:     end.
 5578: 
 5579: warnings(File, Ws, Source) ->
 5580:     case lists:append([W || {F, W} <- Ws, F =:= File]) of
 5581:         [] ->
 5582: 	    [];
 5583:         L ->
 5584:             print_diagnostics(L, Source),
 5585: 	    {warnings, call_format_error(L)}
 5586:     end.
 5587: 
 5588: call_format_error(L) ->
 5589:     %% Smoke test of format_error/1 to make sure that no crashes
 5590:     %% slip through.
 5591:     _ = [Mod:format_error(Term) || {_,Mod,Term} <- L],
 5592:     L.
 5593: 
 5594: print_diagnostics(Warnings, Source) ->
 5595:     case binary:match(Source, <<"-file(">>) of
 5596:         nomatch ->
 5597:             Lines = binary:split(Source, <<"\n">>, [global]),
 5598:             Cs = [print_diagnostic(W, Lines) || W <- Warnings],
 5599:             io:put_chars(Cs);
 5600:         _ ->
 5601:             %% There are probably fake line numbers greater than
 5602:             %% the number of actual lines.
 5603:             ok
 5604:     end.
 5605: 
 5606: print_diagnostic({{LineNum,Column},Mod,Data}, Lines) ->
 5607:     Line0 = lists:nth(LineNum, Lines),
 5608:     <<Line1:(Column-1)/binary,_/binary>> = Line0,
 5609:     Spaces = re:replace(Line1, <<"[^\t]">>, <<" ">>, [global]),
 5610:     CaretLine = [Spaces,"^"],
 5611:     [io_lib:format("~p:~p: ~ts\n", [LineNum,Column,Mod:format_error(Data)]),
 5612:      Line0, "\n",
 5613:      CaretLine, "\n\n"];
 5614: print_diagnostic(_, _) ->
 5615:     [].
 5616: 
 5617: fail() ->
 5618:     ct:fail(failed).
